name: Switch Sides - Cube Adventure
description:
NOT your ordinary maze game! Innovative control pad and simple but brilliant artwork propel you forward in this endless game!

Mechanics
Avoid obstacles as your race the clock to reach the goal and gain more time. Every time you reach the goal, the maze becomes more complicated in an endless challenge! Do you advance towards the goal or risk detouring for coins? You will have to decide as you strive to unlock the many characters.

Artwork
Explore different worlds full of color and incredible scenery. Collect coins to unlock the many fascinating characters, from a penguin or a fantastic Yeti to a dangerous dragon!

For more details, please check our Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/SoulGameFans
